page.title: 10OCCUPATIONS IN AREA
page.content: The main occupation in the area was, based upon questionnaire returns,a variety based upon agriculture.These included cowman,pigman,tractor driver shepherd,farm manager and general farm labourer.Over 60% of those working wereinvolved in farming.Of the remaining occupations in the area 10% were involved in jobs connected with the Albrighton Hunt.These included kennel maid,stable hand,dog handlers and the Hunt Staff.Other occupations in the area include sand and gravel excavating,motor engineering,domestic staff at the large houses and horti- culturists at David Austen Roses. Obviously the major employer in the area is the R.A.F. at Cosford where a large number of domestics,cooks,mess servants,orderlies and civilian maintenance staff are employed.A few are employed at the pumping works.
